# Accessory.Source

**Enumeration**

Type of source an Accessory was loaded from.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Source
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **Accessory.Source.device(_:)**: Device this accessory was initialized with.

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of this Accessory.Source.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible

items.description: Device this accessory was initialized with.
items.name: Accessory.Source.device(_:)

items.description: A textual representation of this Accessory.Source.
items.name: description
